businessGoals: Improve overall customer satisfaction with the digital experience

functionalRequirements.description: Store managers should be able to place new orders with a simplified checkout process (maximum 3 steps)
Store managers should be able to view real-time order status and tracking information
Store managers should be able to access billing history for the past 12 months
Store managers should be able to update their store information and contact details
Store managers should be able to submit and track support tickets
Store managers should be able to search products by name, category, and SKU
Store managers should be able to create and save product bundles for frequent orders
Regional managers should be able to view aggregated data for all stores in their region

technicalRequirements.description: The portal must integrate with the existing ERP system for order and billing data
The portal must integrate with the CRM system for customer and support ticket data
The system should implement SAML-based authentication
Order status data should be updated in near real-time (maximum 5-minute delay)
Billing data can be updated daily (overnight batch process)
The portal should support at least 500 concurrent users
All API endpoints should respond within 2 seconds under normal load
The system should implement appropriate caching mechanisms for product catalog data

designRequirements.description: The interface should comply with WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
The redesign should follow the Acme Inc. brand guidelines for colors, typography, and visual elements
The interface should be fully responsive and provide an optimized experience on mobile devices
The ordering process should be redesigned to require no more than 3 steps
The search functionality should provide autocomplete and filtering options
The dashboard should present key information (recent orders, order status) without requiring additional clicks
Error messages should be clear, specific, and provide guidance on how to resolve the issue

constraints.description: The redesign must be completed within 4 months
The solution must use the existing SAML authentication system
The development team is limited to 6 engineers
The solution must comply with GDPR and local data protection regulations
The project budget is capped at $500,000
